keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map s scrollPageUp
map <c-j> previousTab
map <c-k> nextTab
map <c-o> goBack
map <Tab> goForward
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
map: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
gm: https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ogbl#search/%s gmail
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
az: https://www.amazon.jp/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
qi: https://qiita.com/search?sort=&q=%s Qiita
me: https://www.mercari.com/jp/search/?sort_order=price_asc&keyword=%s&category_root=5&category_child=72&brand_name=&brand_id=&size_group=&price_min=&price_max= メルカリ
pa: https://xn--odkm0eg.gamewith.jp/search/results?query=%s GameWith
gems: https://rubygems.org/search?query=%s
